text: Ia kamaghɨn ifongegh, gumaziba ian arazir amiba bar dar ganɨva, Krais Iesusɨn ziamɨn me Godɨn ziam fam. Tina akar aghuim akurir fofozim God a danightɨ, a deravɨra Godɨn akam akun. Eghtɨ tina igharaz darazir akurvazir fofozim, God a danightɨ, a Godɨn gavgavimɨn igharaz darazir akurvagh. Eghtɨ Krais Iesus zurara, atrivimɨn gavgavim ko ziar ekiam sara, a ko ikɨvɨra ikiam. Bar guizbangɨra.
